Gutierrez and other pro-amnesty advocates pressured Obama 's Department of Homeland Security to undergo a review of its immigration policies .

Last week , Homeland Secretary Jeh Johnson indicated to PBS 's Judy Woodruff that the administration may be on the verge of enacting executive actions to ease even more deportations , even though the myth that Obama is the so - called deporter-in-chief has been thoroughly debunked .
